title: Nine-month-old baby dies after crawling to bucket of water and bleach
text:
A nine-month-old baby has died after he crawled to a bucket of water mixed with bleach he found inside his home in Spain.

The child had entered the kitchen in Gandia, Valencia, when he came into contact with the bucket, which contained both water and detergent.

Police believe the boy was playing near the bucket and had either stuck his head inside the mixture or been close enough to 'inhale the toxic vapours'.

A nine-month-old baby has died at Hospital de Gandia in Valencia (pictured) after he came into contact with a bucket of water mixed with bleach

'Everything indicates that the child was playing near the bucket, where there was a mixture of water with bleach, and either stuck his head in it or was close enough to inhale the toxic vapours,' a spokesman said.

An investigation will now consider whether there was any negligence on the part of his parents.

The child was rushed to a local medical centre when his parents, who are both Moroccan, realised what had happened.

He was then transferred to Hospital de Gandia where he later died from a cardiorespiratory arrest.

Police said everything points to his death being an unfortunate accident and there were no signs of injuries on his body.
description: Police believe the boy had been playing near the bucket in the kitchen of his home in Gandia, Valencia when he had either stuck his head inside the mixture or been close enough to 'inhale the toxic vapours'.
